it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.provider

Class CoapId

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zoolu.util.Identifier
      • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.provider.CoapId

  • public class CoapId
extends Identifier
    CoapId identifies a given CoAP message context. The message context can be any of the following:
    • reliable transmission
    • transaction (i.e. request/response exchange)
    • blockwise transfer
    • message method (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE)
    • message type (REQUEST or response)
    • ANY

    • Field Summary
